explanation: The majority of live opinions and technical references suggest BTC remains in a strong uptrend, with key resistance levels being approached but no major reversal signals. Several participants mention holding or adding to longs, highlight bullish stochastic readings on higher timeframes, and anticipate upside moves towards new highs. Some shorting and caution are present, but bulls appear to dominate sentiment, with multiple references to support holding, technical breakouts, and potential for ATH (all-time high) moves. The candlestick and momentum signals, as well as interplay with bullish tech stock sentiment, further support a high-conviction long bias.
